title: Web Browser Match History Filters not Working
body: For a long time now the web browser match history filters (champion, match type, maps) has not worked for me. It did work initially when it was released but for maybe a year or so the filters haven't worked. I am able to use the drop down menus for the filters and select an option, but when i click go nothing happens and therefore isn't filtered. I have tried using the filters on Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, both of which fail to work. Hopefully someone sees this and can help me as I would like to use the filters regularly (as i did previously) to see past builds and champion stats of mine and friends.

replies.body: I can also confirm it does not work on Firefox or Chrome, but it does work on internet explorer though I would rather not use that...

The first thing I would do is try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to make sure the browser isn't trying to default to past searches you've done. If that doesn't help, hit me back up and we can try a few others things!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1nmxsUoH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-09T02:48:13.720+0000)
>
> The first thing I would do is try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to make sure the browser isn't trying to default to past searches you've done. If that doesn't help, hit me back up and we can try a few others things!

I cleared my browser history and cookies but it did not help.
Hmmmmmmm weeeiiiiird. I'm not sure what else might be stopping that page from working correctly. You're using this [**match history**](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com) website correct?

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1nmxsUoH,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-06-09T03:01:54.378+0000)
>
> Hmmmmmmm weeeiiiiird. I'm not sure what else might be stopping that page from working correctly. You're using this [**match history**](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com) website correct?

Yes I am using that link. The weird thing is it worked when it first came out and for a while after, and then one day the filters (or maybe it's just the go button?) just stopped working.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1nmxsUoH,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-06-09T03:01:54.378+0000)
>
> Hmmmmmmm weeeiiiiird. I'm not sure what else might be stopping that page from working correctly. You're using this [**match history**](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com) website correct?

for me it works on firefox but not opera or chrome, so i think it's something about the website just being coded weird
